Use the RoadMap page in the wiki to plan the future of the project.

  • Refactor ZmqChart into a mixin that can be loaded from OTCmd2.
  • Replace the scripts in bin with a cmd2 threaded application stripped from https://github.com/OpenTrading/OpenTrader.
  • Testing: Write a Mt4 scripts that can run a series of tests.
  • More testing: Write Python scripts that can test Zmq under Mt4.
